question: Which of the following best describes the composition of polycrystalline silicon solar panels? W) A piece of semi-conducting material with a thin silicon film over the top X) One continuous sheet of silicon with a backing of metal-conducting material Y) Lots of individual PV cells that have a backing of metal-conducting material Z) Strips of silicon form the PV cells that have a backing of metal-conducting material
answer:
Y) LOTS OF INDIVIDUAL PV CELLS THAT HAVE A BACKING OF METAL-
